expected_metric: Lead time visibility and weekly planning in place; on-time delivery improved by 15%.
achieved_metric: Dashboard live; weekly reviews started. On-time delivery up 12% in first month.
lessons_learned: Starting with one product line made rollout easier. Next: extend to full range.

expected_metric: 13-week forecast updated weekly; 90-day reserve policy documented and approved.
One ICP, clear attribution, one campaign per quarter with defined success criteria.
First-value moment within 10 minutes; week-1 activation improves by 20%.
achieved_metric: Onboarding v1 shipped; early cohort shows 14% activation lift. Next: tighten prompts and reduce steps.
lessons_learned: Users needed one clearer path not more options. A single guided route improved completion.

expected_metric: More qualified calls with one ICP; outreach conversion improves measurably within 45 days.
